<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>OpenStack Summary</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/summary"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://api.fotbo.com

Access a summary of information related to the user's account.
You may not have services or there may not be funds on your balance to complete this operation.
